content: monkey & yak scarf designed by brandee fondren this super cute scarf is so quick & easy to make it looks just like a stuffed monkey or a yak when it s in your project basket 3 balls patons voodoo size n/10mm hook skill level beginner finished size 5 ft x 4 in stitches used chain double_crochet gauge 7 sts = 4 in double_crochet directions row 1 with n hook chain 9 row 2 double_crochet in 3rd stitch from hook double_crochet in remaining stitches across 7 dcs remaining row chain 2 double_crochet across to end working even row until you use up the 3 balls weave in the ends
